title: Add Logs Drilldown visualization to a dashboard

blocks.content:
Dashboards give you an at-a-glance view of your data and let you track metrics through different visualizations.

To add a Logs Drilldown visualization to a dashboard, complete the following steps:
On the toolbar at the top of the Explore page, click **Add > Add to dashboard**.

On the **Add panel to dashboard** dialog box, perform one of the following:

- To add the visualization to a new dashboard, click **New dashboard**.
- To add the visualization to an existing dashboard, click **Existing dashboard** and select a dashboard from the list.

Click **Open dashboard**.

The visualization appears in a dashboard.
Click **Save dashboard** located in the upper-right of the page.
Enter a title and description for your dashboard, select a folder if applicable, and click **Save**.
